00022 #ifndef CNPROBEGENDERCELLISTENER_H
00023 #define CNPROBEGENDERCELLISTENER_H
00024 
00025 #include "chipstream/AptTypes.h"
00026 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00027 #include "chipstream/GenderCelListener.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <cstring>
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 //
00033 
00034 /**
00035  * @brief Class for determining gender from a cel set of cel files.
00036  */
00037 class CnProbeGenderCelListener : public GenderCelListener {
00038 
00039 public:
00040 
00041   /** 
00042    * Constructor.
00043    */
00044   CnProbeGenderCelListener(const std::string &chrXProbeFile, const std::string &chrYProbeFile,
00045                            double femaleThresh = 0.48, double maleThresh = 0.71, bool chrWZ = false);
00046 
00047   CnProbeGenderCelListener(const std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> >& chrXProbes,
00048                            const std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> >& chrYProbes,
00049                            double femaleThresh = 0.48, double maleThresh = 0.71, bool chrZW = false);
00050   /** 
00051    * Virtual destructor
00052    */
00053   virtual ~CnProbeGenderCelListener() {}
00054 
00055   /** 
00056    * Process another cel files worth of data.
00057    * @param cel - Filehandle to open cel file.
00058    */
00059   void newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel);
00060 
00061   /** 
00062    * Get the genders for the cel files that have been seen.
00063    * @return - vector of gender calls, one for each cel file in order seen.
00064    */
00065   std::vector<affx::Gender> getGenders() {
00066     return m_Genders;
00067   }
00068 
00069   /** 
00070    * Get the last gender called.
00071    * @return - gender call.
00072    */
00073   affx::Gender getLastGender() {return m_Genders[m_Genders.size() - 1];}
00074   float getLastRatio() {return m_vRatios[m_vRatios.size() - 1];}
00075   
00076   /** 
00077    * Get the names for the cel files that have been seen.
00078    * @return - vector of cel file names, one for each cel file in order seen.
00079    */
00080   std::vector<std::string> getCelNames() {
00081     return m_CelNames;
00082   }
00083 
00084   void initialize(double femaleThresh, double maleThresh);
00085 
00086 protected:
00087   affx::Gender callGender(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel, 
00088                           const std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> > &chrxProbes, 
00089                           const std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> > &chryProbes,
00090                           float& fRatio);
00091 
00092   /// Name of the cel files that have been called.
00093   std::vector<std::string> m_CelNames;
00094   /// Gender calls for chips seen.
00095   std::vector<affx::Gender> m_Genders;
00096   std::vector<float> m_vRatios;
00097 
00098   /// Probe ID vectors for ChrX and ChrY
00099   std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> > m_ChrXProbes;
00100   std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> > m_ChrYProbes;
00101 
00102   // strings for printing chromosome letters
00103   // For ZW gender calling, chrZ and W are used in place of X and Y
00104   // respectively.  Using this string enables the messaging to be appropriate
00105   // to the correct chromosome.
00106   std::string m_DipSexChrLetter;
00107   std::string m_HapSexChrLetter;
00108   bool m_ZWGenderCalling;
00109 private:
00110     double m_FemaleThresh;
00111     double m_MaleThresh;
00112 };
00113 
00114 #endif /* CNPPROBEGENDERCELLISTENER_H */
